ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Any comments on the changes?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... useless, so yes it does affect me. Well, the first part of this sentence is laughable.......the second part is untrue. If you guild thinks of you as
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "The Mad Macinchaote" <scendera@...>
>
> Ppl don't group with wizards bc they're seen as
useless, so yes it does affect me.

Well, the first part of this sentence is
laughable.......the second part is untrue.

If you guild thinks of you as worthless (which you
stated earlier you can only get "pity" guild groups),
then it's time to find a new guild. I can't imagine
being a part of a guild where you are appreciated for
your abilities.

Second, you don't have manaburn......and since manaburn
really isn't used much at all as a viable skill in
regular XP groups, this change will have zero impact on
your ability to get groups.

> I practically have to beg to get any sort of a pickup
group.

So do a lot of people
